WindowGetSelection.summary:
The Window.getSelection() method returns a
object representing the range of text selected by the user or
the current position of the caret.
WindowGetSelection.returns:
A object.When cast to string, either by appending an empty string ("") or using
, this object returns the text selected.When called on an iframe that is not displayed (e.g., where
display: none is set) Firefox will return null, whereas other
browsers will return a object with
set to None.
